version_description: Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

Mixgram™ - 4.0 MAJOR UPDATE

Welcome to Mixgram, the Perfect All-in-One Photo Editor! The entire app has been redesigned from the ground up to offer everything you could wish for in photography. Find all of the newest and most popular features like Stickers, Collage, Frames, Beauty Camera, Fonts and full variety of Professional Editing Tools.

COLLAGE
- Combine up to 100 photos in a single frame
- 215 New stylish Layouts
- Newly designed collage making option

TEXT
- Add text to photo redesigned
- Supports multi-line texts
- Adjust paragraph alignment and text size easily

STICKER
- Added 300+ New Stickers

OTHER IMPROVEMENTS
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
- Full Supports Japonaise, Chinese, Vietnamese, Malay, Spanish, Italien and Turkish languages

# We will continue to make you smile with all the awesome features. You would be missing out way too much if you delete the app. Look forward to amazing future updates you'll love, as we listen to and care about every single one of your voice!

Follow us on Instagram: @MixgramApp

Mixgram Designer
Much Love

This app has been updated by Apple to display the Apple Watch app icon.

◉ Every Collage has been crafted carefully to feel and look alive by adding intuitive controls and completely customizable designs.
◉ We have improved the Text Editor tool and added 40 new filters to be applied instantly to photos and collages.
◉ Bug fixed and system optimized to bring you the best user experience!
